about_the_game:
Vanguard Edition：
Exclusive Gold paint job for outpost
Exclusive Accessory: Wings of Freedom
Exclusive access to the Type 30 CIWS. (Unlocked upon researching CIWS.)
Exclusive access to the Viper Chain Gun. (Unlocked upon researching 30mm Twin Light Gun)

Contents from the Vanguard Edition will not be sold as future DLCs.
